revisions.*:
'''Stanislaus S. Uyanto''' is an [[Indonesia]]n [[statistician]]. He is teaching statistics and mathematics at the [[Atma Jaya Catholic University of Indonesia]],  Jakarta.

He is an alumnus of the [[State University of New York at Albany]], where he earned his master's degree in mathematical statistics.  He also earned a master's degree in statistics from the [[University at Buffalo, The State University of New York|State University of New York at Buffalo]]. He holds a Ph.D. in statistics from  the [[University of Melbourne]], Australia.

He is a member of the [[American Statistical Association]].

==Publications==

===Books===
*Uyanto, Stanislaus S. ''Petunjuk Lengkap Pemrograman Komputer Dengan Bahasa C''. Jakarta: Penerbit PT Gramedia Sarana Indonesia (Grasindo). ISBN 979-553-328-2
*Uyanto, Stanislaus S. ''Pedoman Analisis Data Dengan SPSS Edisi-3''. Yogyakarta: Penerbit Graha Ilmu, 2009. ISBN 978-979-756-430-8

==Selected journal articles==
*Uyanto, Stanislaus S.  "Macro SPSS Ridge Regression Sebagai Salah Satu Solusi Multikolinieritas Model Regresi Berganda", ''Jurnal Mat Stat''   volume: 5   issue: 1    published: January 2005.
*Uyanto, Stanislaus S.  "Pendugaan Galat Baku Dengan Metode Bootstrap Menggunakan R Language", ''Majalah Ilmiah Matematika & Komputer''   volume: 21   issue: 1    published: April 2005.
